form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Alien for Adjustment of Status,, I-14.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 (10) (Are you a former excharge visitor who Yes No 15. "X" THE APPROPRIATE BOX BELOW AND FURNISH THE INFORMATION REQUIRED FOR THE BOX MARKED. Alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in Hong Kong British Crown Colony (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) Alien is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at If the application for adjustment of status is denied (City) (State) the alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) PART 1INFORMATION CONCERNING PETITIONING EMPLOYER 16. NAME OF PETITIONER (Full name of organization; if petitioner is an individual give full name with last in capital letters) Daniel Keith LUDWIG 17. ADDRESS (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP code) 360 Lexington Avenue New York New York 10017 18. IF THE BENEFICIARY WILL BE EMPLOYED AT A LOCATION OTHER THAN AT THE ABOVE ADDRESS, GIVE ADDRESS OF PLACE WHERE HE WILL WORK. 1312 Ridgecrest Drive Beverly Hills California 19. HAVE YOU EVER FILED A VISA PETITION FOR AN ALIEN BASED ON HIS PROFESSION OR OCGUPATION? YES NO IF "YES. HOW and MANY SUCH PETITIONS HAVE YOU FILED? under Refugee Escapee Act of June 28, 1962 and 2 previous petitions submitted on March 30, 1962 20. ARE SEPARATE PETITIONS BEING SUBMITTED AT THIS TIME FOR OTHER ALIENS? YES NO. IF "YES," GIVE NAME OF EACH ALIEN. on which visaes were issued but returned unused. 21. IS THIS PETITION BASED ON AN UNEXPIRED CERTIFICATION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR FOR A SPECIFIED NUMBER OF ALIENS WHO WILL PERFORM IDENTICAL SERVICES? YES NO. If "Yes," give file number of petition to which certification is attached. 22. THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS ARE SUBMITTED AS A PART OF THIS PETITION AND ARE MADE A PART THEREOF. OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF PETITIONER OR AUTHORIZED REPRESENTATIVE 23. This petition was prepared by: ("X" one) the petitioner another person. If petition was prepared by another person, Item 24 below must "also" be completed. The petition may be subscribed and sworn to or affirmed only by the following persons: In third preference cases by the beneficiary himself, or by the person filing the petition on the beneficiary's behalf. If the petition is being filed by a person on behalf of the alien beneficiary, Item 24 below must be completed by that person. In sixth preference cases by the employer who desires and intends to employ the beneficiary. If the employer is an organization the petition must be signed, subscribed and sworn to or affirmed by a high level officer or employee of the organization. I swear (affirm) that I have examined the contents of this petition and the accompanying documents and that the statements in this petition and the accompanying documents are true and correct to the best of my information and belief NAME Daniel Keith Ludwig SIGNATURE (Print petitioner's full, true, and correct name) (Petitioner's full, true, and correct name) TITLE not applicable Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 3rd day of March A.D. 19 67 at New York City, New York [SEAL] My commission expires March30 1968 Merm (Signature of officer administering oath) James baright Title) MERWIN CARNRIGHT 24. DECLARATION OF PERSON FILING PETITION FOR THIRD PREFERENCE ON BEHALF OF BENEFICIARY State of New York I declare that I have been requested and authorized by the alien beneficiary to file this petition on his (her) behalf. No. 44-5620615 Qualified in Rockland County Cert. filed in New York Co. (Signature) (Address-Number, Street, City, State and ZIP Code) Commission (Date Expires March 30, 1968 25. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN PETITIONER I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. (Signature) (Address-Number Street, City, State and ZIP Code) (Date) TO PETITIONER: DO NOT FILL IN THIS BLOCK-FOR USE OF IMMIGRATION OFFICER a. Corrections numbered ( ) to ( ) were made by me or at my request. (Date) (City) (Signature of petitioner or authorized member of petitioner's organization) (Title) b. The person whose signature appears immediately above was interviewed under oath and affirmed all allegations contained herein. (Date) (City) (Signature and Title) (Page 2) T
